text: "The Fly" is a 1991 song by Irish rock group U2 and is the leading single from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, New Zealand, Ireland, Australia, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Norway and went to number 61 in the United States. ==Track listings== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1991) Peak position Denmark (IFPI) 2 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 2 Finland (Suomen virallinen lista) 2 Italy (Musica e dischi) 1 Portugal (AFP) 1 Spain (AFYVE) 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1991) Position Australia (ARIA) 48 Belgium (Ultratop) 100 Europe (European Hot 100 Singles) 81 Europe (European Hit Radio) 90 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 71 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 56 New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) 35 UK Singles (OCC) 54 ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Industrial rock songs Category:Dance-rock songs
title: The Fly (U2 song)
